lyrics.stanza: Our hearts, Lord, now You fully own, We love You, Lord, and You alone. Lord, single keep our hearts, and pure, For You and for Your church.
Increase Yourself, O Lord, Now in us, grow more and more. Oh, build Your glorious church— You loved and died for her! To suffer, Lord, and live to You, Our joy, our glory true.
Lord Jesus, we are Your increase, The church, the kingdom, now we see; Lord, may we in Your kingdom live, For Your economy.
May Your recovery, Forward march, spread far and wide. Your lampstands shining forth In every city bright. Nor ill nor hardship do we fear, For Lord, You stand beside.
